  • Hippo Screenprinters Ltd

Hippo Screenprinters Ltd

We are a fine art printmaking studio based in Margaretting near Chelmsford. We specialise in hand-pulled screen print editioning for artists; etching and giclee printing.

Opening Times: 
9am - 5pm daily

Studio Members

Lynne Blackburn
Featured Artist
I am a professional artist and screen printer. I own and run Hippo Screenprinters Ltd, a fine art editioning studio based in Margaretting, Essex.
Ian Bailey

Featured Studios

Cuckoo Farm Studios
Cuckoo Farm Studios is an artist run organisation formed in 1992, in converted farm buildings on the northern outskirts of the historical town of Colchester. Cuckoo Farm Studios is more than a provider of studio space for artists. It is a...
Slack Space
Slack Space Colchester is a not-for-profit volunteer run initiative that successfully transforms empty shops and buildings into community art spaces, where local artists can work, present new & exciting art to the general public as...
High House

Studio Manager Lynne Blackburn
